text: thumb|Headquarters of the Hokkaido Shimbun Press in Sapporo. The , which is often abbreviated as , is a Japanese language daily newspaper published mainly in Hokkaid≈ç, Japan by . As of November 2006, its morning edition has a circulation of 1,208,175.According to the circulation report to Japan Audit Bureau of Circulations, on Hokkaido Shimbun's corporate profile . It was first published in Sapporo in 1887. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Daily newspapers published in Japan Category:Newspaper companies of Japan Category:Companies based in Sapporo Category:Mass media in Sapporo Category:Progressivism in Japan Category:Publications established in 1887 Category:1887 establishments in Japan
